Talents.Name: Industrial Water Cannon
Talents.Description: Can deploy a Reserve Water Cannon that lasts for 20s; the Water Cannon can attack 1 target and push it away slightly

Talents.Name: Upgraded Water Cannon
Talents.Description: Increases the shift level of the Water Cannon's normal attacks and skills by 1, and <Operator Name> will restore 1 SP per 3 seconds if the Water Cannon is located within 4 tiles of her
